column4: well, I'm getting no love in here this morning.  Thanks peeps.  Peace out!!

Its saying that there is only one boot screen for you to choose. Which is the default so nothing to configure. What you should do is go into synaptic and look for plymouth themes and install those packages and then try that command it should then come up with options between 1,2,3,0 -- 0 is defualt
